sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import "./Products.css" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Products = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]) const fetchProducts = async () => { const response = await fetch("https://fakestoreapi.com/products") const data = await response.json() setProducts(data) } useEffect(() => { fetchProducts() }, []) return (

Our Products

{products && products.map(product =>
{product.title}
${product.price}
Add To Cart View
)}
) } export default Products
